code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers

Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches for past 6 weeks. he is a 74 yo male retired. o:Height 64 in, Weight 168 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered ESR.

s:patient C/O Kidney. NKDA. he is a white M retired aged 74 years. o:Height 64 in, Weight 168 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.

s:pt presents with Body Aches of 6 weeks duration. pt is a white male aged 75 Ys. denies any alcohol use he denies smoking o:Height 64 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered ESR.

td.content: s:a 75 year old white M complains of recurrent Kidney over the past month. o:Height 63 in, Weight 165 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
